eventConfirmation.title: Event Invitation
eventConfirmation.message: A new event has been created to which you have been invited, please confirm your attendance:
eventConfirmation.additionalInfo: If you do not wish to attend the event, simply ignore this email. You have 24 hours to confirm.

passwordRecovery.title: Password Recovery
passwordRecovery.message: We have received a request to reset your password. Click on the following link to continue with the process:
passwordRecovery.warning: If you did not request this change, please ignore this email.
passwordRecovery.expiration: This link will expire in 24 hours.
